resources.string: Taking Your Dog For A Walk!
You and Your Dog are on a Walk!
You and Your Dog are Finished Walking.\n\nPress Menu to View Your Walk Details and See How Far You Went!
How much of your walking goal do you need to reach?
How often do you want to walk?
For calculating how far you have walked
To determine how large of steps you take
It has been too long since you have walked your dog! He has lost some loyalty for you.\n\nWalk your dog every day and he will love you!
I Will Not Go on a Walk Today
Walk Him Every Day and He Will Love You!
Walk Your Dog Longer and He Will Be Happier!
We Are Done Walking For Now

You can save your Walk Details on Snaptic to remember how long you walked and how far you went. Snaptic is free and easy to use! Simply install their 3banana Notes application from the Android Marketplace and press "Save Walk Details"!
A virtual dog who reminds you to walk every day for a recommended amount of time. Allows you to see how long and far you walked, and save this data to Snaptic.

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
Visit http://android.konreu.com/ for the source code to this application.
Based on the Pedometer Android App by Levente Bagi (http://code.google.com/p/pedometer/)
Paw icon based on the image at http://www.dog-paw-print.com/dog-paw-print-clip-art.html.Heart images based on http://www.hooplovers.com/_src/sc813/heart-128x100.jpg.

Wagz by Konreu is not directly affiliated with Snaptic, the makers of 3banana Notes and Snaptic.com (located at www.snaptic.com). Wagz uses the 3banana application to save and retrieve information from Snaptic.
Wagz was developed by Konreu as an entry into the Snaptic \"Move Your App! Developer Challenge\" located at https://www.snaptic.com/challenge/.
Special thanks to Jessica Whitney and Brian Stoddard for their help and support in finalizing the original concept of this application.

You will lose your Walk Details. If you would like to save your Walk Details, press Cancel and press the \"Save Walk Details on Snaptic\" button from the Walk Details page.\n\nWould you still like to discard your Walk Details?
Your Dog Wants to Go For a Walk
